page.title: 12TYPES OF FARM IN OUR AREA.
page.content: Nerrols dairy farm has 140 cows,100 heifers,also 160 hens.The farm covers 250 acres. The farm shop sells eggs, sweetcorn,unpasturized milk,vegetables and potatoes.A kestrel, a buzzard and wild animals,such as badgers,mice and foxes,have been seen on the farm. Maidenbrook farm has 28 horses & 145 sheep.They make hay for the animals.At Â£36 a month people can let the stables if they haven't enough room for their horse.They must feed and look after it themselves.Some of the ponies are de- cended from Derby winners and "Meny" has won prizes. Tanpits cider farm make a "very popu- lar,but powerful drink."Father and son work the 100 acres.This year they have planted 1600 trees.The cider is made on the farm using modern machinery.One ton of apples makes 150 gals of cider. It is mainly sold locally at Â£2 a gal.
